subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /It's dark.wav 
  Uploaded by : rosemary_guiley <reguiley@...> 
  Description : This was taken during a Mini-Box session I had at the Ohio State Reformatory on June 14, in the solitary confinement area.  I didn't have my regular speakers attached, but used a Radio Shack iSymphony T-Speaker, which I think accounts in part for the squeakiness.  I think the voice says "It's dark." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/It%27s%20dark.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

rosemary_guiley <reguiley@...>
